name: chapter_3
title: Introduction to Future Tense
description: This chapter introduces the future tense and how it is used to describe actions that will happen.

questions.question: Which sentence is in the future tense?

options.A: I went to the park yesterday.
options.B: I go to the park every day.
options.C: I will go to the park tomorrow.
options.D: I am going to the park now.

questions.question: Which of the following is correct in future tense?

options.D: She will go to school tomorrow.

questions.question: When do we use the future tense?

options.D: To describe actions that will happen.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence in future tense.

options.A: They will play football next weekend.
options.D: They are playing football next weekend.
